mapper.insert: insert into ams_stock_black_white_list_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from ams_stock_black_white_list as tb where black_white_id= #{black_white_id}
